note:
I'd have written less code but I didn't have the time.

I tried to steal that line from Mark Twain, but turns out Clemens never said it.

I put the line in my bio to make a Functional Programming joke.

So, turns out, the joke is, it was Blaise Pascal that said it, in 1656.

"I made this one longer only because I have not had the leisure to make it shorter."

Good to have some closure.
